metadata.title: CVE-2021-3816 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Cacti 1.1.38 allows authenticated users with User Management permissions to inject arbitrary HTML in the group_prefix field during the creation of a new group via "Copy" method at user_group_admin.php.

criterions.comment: cacti package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
